casebody.data:
REXNORD CORPORATION, et al.
v.
SUN DRAINAGE PRODUCTS, LLC, et al. 157A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 14, 2017 Benjamin P. Fryer, Attorney at Law, E. Taylor Stukes, Attorney at Law, Sarah H. Negus, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Rexnord Corporation, et al. William S. Cherry, III, Attorney at Law, J. Whitfield Gibson, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Sun Drainage Products, LLC. Thomas C. Kilpatrick, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Bauer, James R.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 10th of July 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of July 2017."

*122Plaintiff-Appellant shall have up to and including the 21st day of August 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
